plugins.name: claude-ultimate-hud
plugins.description: All-in-one status line: model info, context usage, rate limits (5h/7d), project details with git branch, CLAUDE.md/rules/MCPs/hooks counts, tool activity, agent status, and todo progress. Supports Max and Pro plans with i18n (English/Korean).
